front.title: Part-1 of The Router-to-Router (RRP) PacketWay Protocol for High-Performance Interconnection of Computer Clusters

abstract.t: The PktWay protocol is introduced in the 'The End-to-End (EEP) PacketWay Protocol for High-Performance Interconnection of Computer Clusters'. This document defines the basic part (Part 1) of the Router-to-Router protocol (RRP) of PacketWay. The shorter 'PktWay' is used for 'PacketWay'.
